abstract: President Obama will promote Austan D. Goolsbee to chairman of his Council of Economic Advisers.
snippet: President Obama will promote Austan D. Goolsbee to chairman of his Council of Economic Advisers.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON  President Obama on Friday will promote a longtime economic adviser, Austan D. Goolsbee, to chairman of his Council of Economic Advisers, signaling continuity even as a high unemployment rate has left much of the public dissatisfied with administration policies.

headline.main: Top Adviser to Lead Panel on Economy
headline.print_headline: Top Adviser To Lead Panel On Economy

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: White House Council of Economic Advisers
